attributes.short_header: Haverhill Line (select evening trains) will be suspended between Haverhill and Bradford on Fri, Sep 23, through Sun, Sep 25
attributes.service_effect: Suspension of service on Haverhill Line
attributes.header: Haverhill Line service (select evening trains) will be suspended between Haverhill and Bradford Stations on Friday,  September 23,  through Sunday, September 25, due to bridge construction
attributes.description:
Due to track construction, select evening trains will be suspended between Bradford and Haverhill Stations in both directions on the following dates:

- Friday September 23, 2016
- Saturday September 24, 2016
- Sunday September 25, 2016 

Select inbound/outbound Haverhill Line trips will be replaced with shuttle buses between Bradford and Haverhill Stations. Customers should allow additional travel time anticipating delays of approximately five (5) minutes.

The following trains will be affected:

Friday
223 (7:40pm from Boston)
226 (9:10pm from Haverhill)
225 (9:20pm from Boston)
228 (10:50pm from Haverhill)
227 (11:00pm from Boston)
229 (12:10am from Boston) 

Saturday
1207 (5:50pm from Boston)
1208 (7:20pm from Haverhill)
1209 (8:40pm from Boston)
1210 (10:10pm from Haverhill)
1211 (11:30pm from Boston)

Sunday
2207 (5:50pm from Boston)
2208 (7:20pm from Haverhill)
2209 (8:40pm from Boston)
2210 (10:10pm from Haverhill)
2211 (11:30pm from Boston)

Affected stops:
Bradford
Haverhill

attributes.header: Shuttle buses will replace Fitchburg Line service (select trains) between North Leominster and Fitchburg Stations on Thursday, September 22, and Friday, September 23, due to signal work.
attributes.description:
Due to signal modification, select trains will be suspended between North Leominster and Fitchburg Stations in both directions on the following dates:

- Thursday, September 22, 2016
- Friday, September 23, 2016 

Select inbound/outbound Fitchburg Line trips will be replaced with shuttle buses between North Leominster and Fitchburg Stations. Fitchburg Station Customers are urged to park at North Leominster Station if possible. Customers should also allow additional travel time anticipating delays of approximately twenty (20) minutes.

The following trains will be affected:

attributes.short_header: Due to the Simon Company's Copley Place construction, Back Bay Stations Dartmouth Street underpass will remain closed through December 2016.
attributes.header: Due to the Simon Company's Copley Place construction, Back Bay Stations Dartmouth Street underpass will remain closed through December 2016.
attributes.description:
Due to Copley Place construction being performed by the Simon Company, the Dartmouth Street underpass  leading to and from the west side of Dartmouth Street at Back Bay Station will be temporarily closed from beginning Sunday, March 6, through December 2016. 

Customers are encouraged to use the stations main entrance on the east side of Dartmouth Street during the underpasss closure. 

Affected routes:
Orange Line
Framingham/Worcester Line
Needham Line
Franklin Line
Providence/Stoughton Line

attributes.short_header: Courthouse Station's south entrance/exit will remain closed until fall 2016 due to the Yotel Hotel Development.
attributes.service_effect: Silver Line - SL1 and Silver Line - SL2 notice
attributes.header: Courthouse Station's south entrance/exit will remain closed until fall 2016 due to the Yotel Hotel Development.
attributes.description:
Due to the construction of the Yotel Hotel Development, the south entrance/exit at Courthouse Station will be closed from Monday, October 5, 2015, until fall 2016. To exit/enter the station, please use the north entrance across the street. 

Also please note that Courthouse Elevator 939 will be unavailable during this time. Customers desiring elevator access should use Courthouse Elevator 940 to exit/enter Courthouse. This elevator is located on the opposite side of the lobby. At the street, cross Seaport Boulevard to use Courthouse Elevator 940.

attributes.service_effect: Suspension of service on Haverhill Line
attributes.header: Haverhill Line service (select trains) will be suspended between North Wilmington and Haverhill Stations on Saturday, September 24, and Sunday, September 25, due to track work
attributes.description:
Due to track construction, select trains will be suspended between North Wilmington and Haverhill Stations in both directions on the following dates:

- Saturday September 24th, 2016
- Sunday September 25th, 2016 

Select inbound/outbound Haverhill Line trips will be replaced with shuttle buses between Reading* and Haverhill Stations. Customers should allow additional travel time anticipating delays of approximately fifteen (15) minutes.

*Though shuttle buses will operate to/from Reading, these select trains will terminate/originate at North Wilmington.

The following trains will be affected:
Saturday
1200 (7:15am from Haverhill)
1201 (8:40am from Boston)
1202 (10:25am from Haverhill)
1203 (11:25am from Boston)
1204 (1:15pm from Haverhill)
1205 (2:45pm from Boston)
1206 (4:15pm from Haverhill)

Sunday

2203 (11:25am from Boston)
2204 (1:15pm from Haverhill)
2205 (2:45pm from Boston)
2206 (4:15pm from Haverhill)

Ballardvale
Andover
Lawrence
Bradford
Haverhill
